Regulation Name(s): Device To Detect And Identify Nucleic Acid Targets In Respiratory Specimens From Microbial Agents That Cause The SARS-Cov-2 Respiratory Infection And Other Microbial Agents When In A Multi-Target Test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Panther Fusion SARS-CoV-2/Flu A/B/RSV multiplex RT-PCR assay for detection and differentiation of respiratory viruses using the Panther Fusion system
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and differentiation of SARS-CoV-2, influenza A, influenza B, and RSV nucleic acids from nasopharyngeal swab specimens in symptomatic individuals to aid differential diagnosis of respiratory infections using the Panther Fusion system
